pages.text: A Slaugtergleam is an arcane gem associated with death and treasure.$(br2)The gem is an $(l:arsenal/arcane_gems#cuts)$(9)asscher cut$() and displays the red spectrum.

When a Slaughtergleam is held and toggled on, your attacks are considered to have a $(9)Looting I$() enchantment.$(br2)If the weapon you hold is already enchanted with $(9)Looting$(), its level is treated as one higher instead.$(br2)To recharge a dun Slaughtergleam, right click it while you have $(9)gold nuggets$() in your inventory. Five nuggets are required for a full recharge.
